https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dzAPkAj2bZZLarC0dVeYtaNId41.jpg Students Adalberto and Luna meet and fall in love. Far from home, they can't get to know each other's family. This has to change once Luna gets pregnant. Adalberto first paints such an unflattering portrait of them that Luna says: "you talk as if they were monsters ". Little does she know. A Monstrous Family
